title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Guided museum tour.  See where a new vision of America came to power when Theodore Roosevelt assumed the presidency.  The tour includes three restored rooms, video and audio, and interactive activities.  It is recommended to allow approximately one hour to tour. The Site can only be viewed by a guided tour. Tour schedule.   Special Behind-the-Scenes tours are also available on a periodic basis.
